Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A thiosemicarbazone antimetabolite. A derivative of 5-hydroxypicolinaldehyde, 5-HP inhibits DNA polymerase, resulting in the inhibition of DNA replication and cell death. (NCI04)
